resources.string: Some data displayed on Focus page will be automatically updated when cold start or pull-down to refresh.
If you have already changed the initial password of your school card, please enter a new password here to use the quick recharge and campus network login functions.
Password of the educational administration system

If you have already changed the initial password of the educational administration system, please enter a new password here to use the functions of classmates, classrooms, and the school-wide training program.

After cold starting the application, a unified CAS login will be automatically performed in the background. Please enable it as needed. This is a time-consuming operation and does not require refreshing the login status every time you use it
Allow the upload of non-sensitive data such as crash logs to help improve the experience better.
If the school card or exam results cannot be checked, it might be because the login has expired and you need to log in again.
